1.title: Melissa Joan Hart, Caroline Rhea, Jared Logan

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Actresses Melissa Joan Hart and Caroline Rhea have a mini-Sabrina the Teenage Witch reunion, and Jared Logan beats up jocks. Plus, find out who will win the title of "Best Talk Show Guest in America!"

2.title: Colin Quinn, Charles Barkley, Marissa Jaret Winokur

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Colin Quinn and Charles Barkley trash-talk their way through the competition, but are they a match for Broadway diva Marissa Jaret Winokur? Plus, find out who's "Best Talk Show Guest in America!"

1.title: She Ready, Boo!

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Basketball legend John Salley reaches new heights, actress Tiffany Haddish tells of her $280 million car ride, and actor/writer Dan Bucatinksy makes a comeback pitch. Find out who takes the title of best talk show guest in America.

2.title: National Treasure

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Comedian Wanda Sykes brings the bubbly, actor Scott Adsit shows us his unusual pet, and reality star Pandora Boxx explains what happens when two divas collide; but only one will win the title of "best talk show guest in America."

3.title: Times a Wastin

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: On this episode of Talk Show the Game Show, comedian Maria Bamford has an unusual vision of Guy's future, truTV's Ben Roy drinks, spits and swirls for points, and impressionist James Adomian becomes three guests in one. But only one will win as they compete for the title of best talk show guest in America.

4.title: I'll Burn It Down

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: On this episode of Talk Show the Game Show, comedian Nicole Byer high kicks her way into the judges hearts, truTV's Kyle Kinane hunts for points, and comedian, Julian McCullough wigs out with Guy. Watch and find out which guest will win the title of best talk show guest in America.

5.title: Milk and Cookies

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Oscar winner Diablo Cody shares HER pop goddess obsession, rock star Moby reveals the birth of his name, and comedian Arden Myrin magically flashes her way to the top. Only one can win the title of best talk show guest in America.

6.title: Rare Air

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Comedian and best-selling author Chelsea Handler regifts an anatomically correct present to Guy, ex-pro footballer Maurice Jones-Drew draws a foul while singing, and comedian Nikki Glaser dishes on breakups and make-ups.

7.title: Panel of Questionable Blazers

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Comedian Fortune Feimster dishes on a celebrity party, truTV's Adam Cayton-Holland gets heated over birds, and actress Alice Wetterlund gives Guy a hunky gift. Plus, a legendary surprise guest enters Talk Show Stadium!

9.title: Balls Get in the Way

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Comedian/actor Aasif Mandvi talks about his vices, actor John Ross Bowie is an open book about Heathers he's dated, and comedian Phoebe Robinson "Chers" a boob grazing story. Plus, not one, but two special surprise guests!

12.plot: Actress Wendi McLendon Covey dishes on the drama in the LBC, comedian Jonah Ray bums cash from the crowd and funny lady Michelle Buteau tells of her indecent proposal. But only one can be named best talk show guest in America.

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Comedian Margaret Cho wigs out, director Paul Feig shows he's magic, and actor Ed Weeks' British accent goes to the dogs. Find out who will be crowned the best talk show guest in America.

15.title: Ankle Cleavage

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Actor John Early channels his best "Britney," political commentator Ana Navarro boycotts all things orange, and actress Kate Flannery dishes on her days of waiting tables for celebs.

16.title: Hot Gossip

episode of.title: Talk Show the Game Show (TV Series 2017– )

imdb.plot outline: Comedian Guy Branum (The Mindy Project, Chelsea Lately) brings his distinct point of view to truTV with Talk Show the Game Show, a hilarious mashup of two beloved television formats that pits comedians and celebrities against each other for the title of "Best Guest of the Night." Based off of Branum's popular live comedy show, in each episode, celebrity guests become contestants as they compete in various talk show-inspired challenges and are judged by a comedic panel who awards points and roasts their performances.
imdb.title: Talk Show the Game Show
akas: Talk Show the Game Show (United States)
plot: Comedian Guy Branum (The Mindy Project, Chelsea Lately) brings his distinct point of view to truTV with _Talk Show the Game Show_ (qv), a hilarious mashup of two beloved television formats that pits comedians and celebrities against each other for the title of "Best Guest of the Night." Based off of Branum's popular live comedy show, in each episode, celebrity guests become contestants as they compete in various talk show-inspired challenges and are judged by a comedic panel who awards points and roasts their performances.::truTV
